message: This proposal divides the money equally, considering the diminishing value of money with each round.
You're giving me a smaller share, so I'm taking a bigger cut this time!
I propose a more balanced distribution, aiming for a fair split despite the decreasing value of money.
You're trying to squeeze me out, but I'm not going to let you!
I believe in a fair and equal division, given the constraints of inflation. Let's aim for mutual benefit.
